title: Bring your pet home to Morrowood Townhomes! We accept pets!
posting_body: ['Morrowood Townhomes', '5915 Trammell Rd Morrow, GA 30260', 'Pricing:', '$1282 - $2490/Month*', 'Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '1.5', 'Square Footage:', '1281 sq ft', 'show contact info', 'Features in this apartment home:', '➢ Ceiling Fans', '➢ Dining Room', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Frost-Free Refrigerator', '➢ Kitchen', '➢ Range', '➢ Refrigerator', '➢ Tub/Shower', '➢ Wall to Wall Carpeting', '➢ Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '➢ Central Air Conditioning and Heating', '➢ Private Patio or Balcony', '➢ Spacious Floor Plans', '➢ Vaulted Ceilings in Select Units', '➢ Vinyl Flooring', '➢ Walk-In & Double Closets', '➢ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '➢ Window Coverings', 'About the community:', 'Morrow has very affordable apartments with great amenities all over the city.', 'After you find your apartment, visit VN Pho on Jonesboro Road for the best Vietnamese noodle soups and bubble tea in Morrow.', 'Amenities at our property:', '➢ 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service', '➢ BBQ/Picnic Area', '➢ Laundry Facilities', '➢ On-Site Maintenance/Management', '➢ Pet Play Area', '➢ Sparkling Swimming Pool', '➢', 'Well Equipped One-Acre Playground', '➢ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '➢ Convenient Online Rental Payments', '➢ Convenient to Southlake Mall, Clayton State University & Hospitals', '➢ Easy Access to International Airport, Highways, & Interstates 75, 285 & 675', '➢ Free Pest Control', '➢', 'Lush, Professionally Maintained Landscaping', '➢ Package Service', '➢ Pet Friendly', '➢ Resident Referral Program', 'Additional information:', 'Terms:', '6-Month, 12-Month', 'Pets:', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions may apply.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Professionally managed by Peak Living', '*Prices are subject to change without notice', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '0AB97751EA4945']
